entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19 except minus 15 in the Natuashish area.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 except minus 15 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
